title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: There is excessive flashing in the Control Example. I would like to understand why this is happening.
OB: When running the control example and resizing the window vertically only, I noticed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The flashing in the Control Example should be reduced or eliminated during window resizing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window vertically.
3. Observe the flashing of all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
